observation_text: There is no broadcasting station at Porth, Glam., and it is hardly likely that you would hear an amateur transmitter of that district. Although your estimated W.L. does not tally, it is possible that this was the Cork station. If you mean midday, Cork relays gramophone transmissions from Dublin; if you really mean midnight, the station may have been effecting tests.
